dct_description_sm: Timber Operations exempt from the Plan preparation and submission requirements (PRC § 4581) and may be exempt from the completion report and stocking report requirements (PRC §§ 4585 and 4587) of the Forest Practice Act. Exemptions include: Less than 3 Acre Conversions; Dead, Dying and Diseased, Fuelwood split products; Christmas Trees; Public Agency; Public and Private Utility Right of Way; Substantially Damaged Timberland; 150ft or 300ft Fire Hazard Tree Removal; Forest Fire Prevention; Drought Mortality. Only Exemption Notices from February 2019 onwards are included in this data set.
dct_rights_sm: The user will cite the Department of Forestry and Fire Protection as the original source of the maps, but will clearly denote cases where the original maps have been updated, modified, or in any way altered from the original condition. The State of California and the Department of Forestry and Fire Protection make no representations or warranties regarding the accuracy of data or maps. Neither the State nor the Department shall be liable under any circumstances for any direct, special, incidental, or consequential damages with respect to any claim by any user or third party on account of or arising from the use of data or maps.
